programme.title: Steven Seagal: Lawman - The Perfect Target
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 When team Seagal runs across a man waving a gun on a highway, they discover that the gun is fully loaded--and so is the driver.

programme.title: Steven Seagal: Lawman - To Live or Die
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Deputy Chief Steven Seagal and his team find themselves in a desperate situation when two men are robbed and shot. Steven tries to keep the victims calm until the ambulance gets there but it's not clear if the men will live.

programme.title: Steven Seagal: Lawman - Street Justice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Deputy Chief Steven Seagal and his team get word that there may be some drug use at a local motel and there is: crack cocaine. It's a busy night, first the motel bust and then two other crack-related stops.

programme.title: SWAT - Dallas SWAT - 24
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Sr. Corporal Rich Emberlin returns to action after months of recovering from a painful back surgery. He's thrown right into the fray on his first day back when he's called in to face a man barricaded in his home.

programme.title: SWAT - Detroit SWAT-29
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 Sgt. Kevin "Condor" Shepherd and Officer Elijah "Goldmember" Hayes run a tough narcotics warrant on an alleged drug house that's especially well fortified. Did the suspect underestimate the strength of the team, or has the team met its match?

programme.title: SWAT - Dallas SWAT
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 It's a tense moment for Officer Terigi Rossi and Sr. Corporal Rich Emberlin, when they are called out to capture a bank robbery suspect they think, has barricaded himself inside a garage.

programme.title: The First 48 - Breaking the Silence / Letters of Intent
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 7 In Cincinnati, Detectives Keith Witherell and Bill Hilbert attempt to crack the code of silence surrounding the death of a 28-year-old man gunned down on Main Street.

programme.title: The First 48 - Return to Sender / Death Camp
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 2 In Dallas, Det. Rick Duggan investigates the murder of a young man shot in the backseat of his friend's car. While scouring the crime scene, Duggan finds an interesting lead--mail. He hopes this clue will lead him to the killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Alias / Duel
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 8 In Louisville, murder hits close to home when Detective Rick Arnold learns that the victim of his most recent homicide case is the brother of a good friend.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fast Friends /The Thin Line
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 6 In Cleveland, a young father is murdered in his car and detectives discover his friend may know who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: The First 48 - Cranked
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 8 When an innocent father is brutally stabbed, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter delves into the dark and dangerous world of methamphetamine addiction in order to stop a killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Road Rage (#454)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 51 When a father of three is gunned down after confronting a hit-and-run driver, Mobile detectives struggle to find clues that will lead them to his killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Easy Mark (#438)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 38 In Tulsa, when detectives investigate the murder of a man with a troubled past, they uncover a sinister plot.

programme.title: The First 48 - Breaking the Silence / Letters of Intent
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 7 In Cincinnati, Detectives Keith Witherell and Bill Hilbert attempt to crack the code of silence surrounding the death of a 28-year-old man gunned down on Main Street.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Rubbermaid Box
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 313 The Rubbermaid Box is the story of Carolyn Jansen, the mysterious circumstances surrounding her murder and how cutting-edge forensics and dedicated investigators eventually caught-up with her killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Romance/ Out of Control
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 5 In Minneapolis, when a young Somali girl is executed in bed, Sergeants Charlie Adams and Chris Thomsen uncover a secret relationship that may have turned deadly.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Fighting Chance
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 7 When an argument at a local bar ends with a young social activist shot sixteen times, Tulsa Detective Ronnie Leatherman searches for answers in a divided community.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Other Wife
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 10 When a father is gunned down protecting his wife in Kansas City, Detectives hope his ex-wife knows who wanted him dead.

programme.title: After the First 48 - No Return
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A beloved father of three is gunned down outside his home in Atascocita, Texas, during a robbery gone wrong. Investigators catch a lucky break with a surprise piece of evidence.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Into the Woods
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 1 After a 17-year-old girl is found with a bullet through the back of her head in the woods of Katy, Texas, a young man comes forward who claims to be an eyewitness. Investigators are shocked by the unusual deal he's made with the DA.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After the First 48 - 44
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 3 In Liberty City, Miami a well-liked husband and wife are brutally murdered in an ambush shooting.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Brother's Blood
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 4 When a Honduran immigrant is found stabbed to death in his Miami apartment, his brother claims it was a suicide. But as investigators dig deeper, all evidence points to the surviving brother.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Seduced to Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 58 A look at a seductress who kills two Georgia policemen for their life insurance benefits.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Toy Box
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 59 A state employee abducts women and keeps them captive.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Killer Cabbie
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 60 A serial killer lays siege to Jacksonville, Florida. This murderer operates with impunity, thinking he is above the law, until the sins of his past come back to haunt him and justice is served.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Random Rampage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 61 A look at a wayward son who goes on a shooting spree, killing five people from two families.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Namaslay
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 When she's caught stealing, an aspiring 20-something lifestyle blogger tries to prevent herself from being fired and gets locked up for murder instead.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Iron Murphy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 In Prohibition-era Chicago, a down-and-out barfly looks like the perfect target for a get-rich-quick insurance scheme. That is, until he refuses to keel over.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Sex, Lies & Smoothies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 23 A rich Canadian expat in Dubai reports that her husband is missing. And detectives soon find his decomposing body in a box in the building's utility room.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Beauty Queen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Karyn Slover's been offered to work as a model by an agency in Los Angeles. Leaving her ex-husband, friends, and current boyfriend behind, she leaves her desk at the local newspaper at 5 PM and is never heard from again.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Is There In Truth No Beauty?
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Miranda Jones, a telepath who studied mental disciplines on Vulcan, arrives with Ambassador Kolos, a Medusan.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Spectre Of The Gun
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 When coming to a xenophobic isolationist planet, Captain Kirk and his landing party are punished for trespassing.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Day Of The Dove
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 When the Enterprise brings aboard Klingon prisoners, an alien entity pits both sides against each other in an ever-escalating struggle.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 At the same time McCoy discovers that he has a year to live, the U.S.S. Enterprise encounters the asteroid Yonada which is determined to be artificially propelled.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Tholian Web
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 Kirk is trapped in interphase, while the Enterprise is trapped by a powerful energy web.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Plato's Stepchildren
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 After Dr. McCoy helps the leader of a planet populated by people with powerful psionic abilities, they decide to force him to stay by torturing his comrades until he submits.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Wink Of An Eye
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Hyper-accelerated aliens, invisible to the naked eye, take over the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Empath
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 On a planet doomed to destruction, Kirk, Spock, and McCoy become involved with two aliens who use them as laboratory animals in a bizarre series of tests on an alien empath who may be the savior of her planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Elaan Of Troyius
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 The Enterprise must escort an alien princess to her marriage to seal an interplanetary alliance. In their journey, she becomes attracted to Kirk.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Whom Gods Destroy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 Kirk and Spock deliver medicine to an insane asylum where a former Starfleet captain is being held. They discover that he has freed the inmates and is running the place.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Let That Be Your Last Battlefield
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 The Enterprise hosts two alien beings from the same planet who share an intense and self-destructive hatred of each other.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Mark Of Gideon
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 Kirk beams down on a diplomatic mission. He finds himself on an Enterprise where all the crew has vanished, and only a mysterious woman resides.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - That Which Survives
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 Kirk, McCoy, and Sulu are stranded on a barren planet where a mysterious woman attempts to kill them one at a time, while the Enterprise must travel halfway across the galaxy to rescue them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 25 An alien weapon that possesses artificial intelligence begins to terrorize the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Equinox, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 26 Another Federation starship in the Delta Quadrant brings trouble for Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Equinox, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 Starfleet's honor is tested when two captains fight a battle of wills.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Survival Instinct

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Barge Of The Dead

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tinker, Tenor, Doctor, Spy

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alice

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Riddles
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 The crew discovers a new side of Tuvok when an enemy attack leaves him stripped of his Vulcan sensibilities.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Dragon's Teeth

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - One Small Step

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Voyager Conspiracy

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files - Cold Case Files
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: MST3K: The Batwoman - MST3K: The Batwoman
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).

programme.title: MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru - MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

programme.title: MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come - MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

programme.title: MST3K: The Mask - MST3K: The Mask
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.

programme.title: MST3K: The Bubble - MST3K: The Bubble
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.

programme.title: MST3K: The Christmas Dragon - MST3K: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: MST3K - MST3K
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Good Witch - Surprise Me
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Hallmark Original Series. Cassie is surprised with adventurous outings by both Sam and John.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas - A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles - A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 With a little help from an angel, Christmas miracles happen for a homeless family. Stars Patty Duke, Laura Dern, Carla Gugino, Lynn Redgrave, and Kathy Baker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Away & Back - Away & Back
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jack Peterson, a widowed father of three young children, encounters Ginny Newsom, a wildlife biologist, whose mission is tracking trumpeter swans, a family of which settles on a pond on the Peterson farm.

programme.title: For Love & Honor - For Love & Honor
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a by-the-book army veteran takes over as commandant at a military academy, he instantly squares off with the school's new Dean of Academics. But when they are forced to work together to help save the school, sparks fly.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Cupid & Cate - Cupid & Cate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mary-Louise Parker stars as a vibrant young woman who breaks off an uninspired relationship when she falls for a witty and kind young lawyer. Also stars Peter Gallagher and Bebe Neuwirth. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Hallmark Movies & More - Hallmark Movies & More
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Descent
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped inside…and time running out.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Frozen
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Nightwalkers
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Abyss
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 A Goa'uld lord holds O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) captive and tortures him for information about the Tok'ra. As O'Neill suffers, Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) appears and offers support. Meanwhile, SG-1 races to O'Neill before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Shadow Play
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Quinn is conflicted when a professor from his home planet asks SG-1 to help stage a coup against the Kelownan government in order to stop a civil war. Should SG-1 allow the planet to destroy itself…or are they placing themselves in needless danger?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Other Guys
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 Two scientists working on an off-world research project witness SG-1 captured in a Goa'uld raid and attempt to rescue them. Little do they know that SG-1 staged the capture in order to infiltrate the Goa'uld and make contact with a Tok'ra informant.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Allegiance
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 The Tok'ra must take refuge from the Goa'uld at the SGC Alpha Site occupied by Jaffa. Bad blood between the races begins to boil as an assassin wreaks havoc on the camp. Can O'Neill stop the bloodshed before the assassin escapes with coordinates?

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Siege (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay (David Hewlett) leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform to destroy the Wraith.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Siege (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 Just as the team is beginning to lose hope, Col. Everett is sent from the Stargate Program on Earth. As Everett and the team strategize, a new battleship, the Daedalus, arrives with a new Zero Point Module, bringing with it new hope.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Siege (Part 3)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 The team is saved with the arrival of Colonel Steven Caldwell, the Daedalus, and the destruction of the two approaching Wraith ships. McKay hopes the Zero Point Module will be the key to their success, meanwhile, Ford seems off after an accident.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Intruder
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Sheppard starts to question things when strange malfunctions begin to occur after the team returns from a trip to Earth. The team discovers that the Daedalus has been infected with a Wraith Virus, causing the ship to go into survival mode.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Runner
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 The search for Lt. Ford leads Sheppard and Teyla to planet P3M-736 where they are captured by Ronon Dex, a man who is on the run, being hunted by the Wraith. The team offers to help Ronon, going up against the Wraith once again.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Duet
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 While on Planet Thenora, the team is shocked when McKay and marine officer Laura Cadman are suddenly taken aboard a Wraith Dart. When the team shoots down the Dart, they discover a technical glitch has put Cadman's consciousness in McKay's body.

programme.title: Stargate - Stargate
programme.desc: no info available
